data.name: AM_ShareFromMegaFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process to share item(s) from MEGA with other app fails - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_AlreadyPurchased
data.value: Покупка MEGA не відбулася, тому що ви вже придбали цей товар.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user already has purchased an item from the store

data.name: AM_AlreadyPurchased_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user already has purchased an item from the store

data.name: AM_PurchaseFailed
data.value: Ваша покупка підписки MEGA не відбулася або скасована. Будь ласка, зв'яжіться з підтримкою Windows Store.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user tries to purchase an item from the store and it failed

data.name: AM_PurchaseFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user tries to purchase an item from the store and it failed

data.name: AM_PurchaseSucceeded
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user has purchased an item from the store

data.name: AM_PurchaseSucceeded_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user has purchased an item from the store

data.name: AM_PurchaseValidationFailed
data.value: Ваша покупка підписки MEGA ще не пройшла перевірку на нашому сервері ліцензій. У наступному завантаженні цього додатку, ми повторимо перевірку ліцензії підписки. Будь ласка, зв'яжіться зі службою підтримки, якщо помилка буде відтворюватися.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed in cases that validation of the IAP purchase has failed at the MEGA License server

data.name: AM_PurchaseValidationFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed in cases that validation of the IAP purchase has failed at the MEGA License server

data.name: AM_AssociatedUserAccountTerminated
data.value: Дію облікового запису було припинено через численні порушення Умов надання послуг.
data.comment: Error message shown when you open a file/folder link (or other shared resource) and it's no longer available because the the associated user account has been terminated due to multiple violations of our Terms of Service.

data.name: AM_DownloadFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a node failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_DownloadFolderLinkFailed
data.value: Не вдалося завантажити ланку теки. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to download a folder link.

data.name: AM_ImportFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import a node - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_ImportFolderLinkFailed
data.value: Не можливо імпортувати ланку теки. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when fails the process/request to import a folder link.

data.name: AM_EmailAlreadyRegistered
data.value: Ця e-mail адреса, вже зареєстрована в MEGA.
data.comment: Message of the dialog shown when the users tries to create an account with an email already in use.

data.name: AM_IncompleteConfirmationLink
data.value: Ланка підтвердження акаунту, що ви використовуєте не повна. Будь ласка, перевірте довжину ланки і переконайтесь що скопіювали її повністю, та спробуйте ще раз.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user try to confirm a MEGA account but the confirm link is incomplete because it has less characters than it should (probably because the user hasn't copied and pasted the entire link).

data.name: AM_NewSignUpInvalidLink
data.value: Посилання, яке ви використовуєте для нового входу не дійсне.
data.comment: Message of the warning dialog shown when the user tries to make a new sign up using an invalid link (#newsignup).

data.name: AM_AccountBlocked
data.value: Your account was terminated due to a breach of MEGA’s Terms of Service, such as abuse of rights of others; sharing and/or importing illegal data; or system abuse.
data.comment: Message of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and the account has been blocked.

data.name: AM_AccountNotConfirmed
data.comment: Message of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and the account has not been confirmed yet.

data.name: AM_TooManyFailedLoginAttempts
data.value: Ви зробили забагато спроб входу. Будь ласка, зачекайте {0} і спробуйте ще раз.
data.comment: Message of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and has made several failed attempts. Preserve the {0} code because is for include the exact time until the user has to wait.

data.name: AM_AccountBlocked_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog shown when the user is trying to login and the account has been blocked.

data.name: AM_ShareFromMegaAppBusy_Message
data.value: Не вдалося встановити спільне використання з MEGA. Віддалений додаток не доступний. Будь ласка, спробуйте пізніше.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to share item(s) from MEGA with other app fails because the destination app is busy.

data.name: AM_GetNodeDetailsFailed
data.value: Не вдалося отримати деталі ключового вузла. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get node details failed.

data.name: AM_GetNodeDetailsFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to get node details failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_DownloadPathUnknownError
data.value: Виникла невідома помилка в шляху завантаження. Будь ласка, спробуйте ще раз, і якщо помилка відтворюється, будь ласка, зв'яжіться з support@mega.nz. [{0}]
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to download a file/folder failed because an unknown error in the download path. Preserve the [{0}] code because is for include the error code or the error message in runtime.

data.name: AM_InternalNodeNotFound
data.value: The file/folder of the link that you are trying to open was not found. You are probably logged in to a different account. Please, log in to the correct account and try again.
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when trying to open a link of an internal node and this node is not found in the account in which the user is logged in.

data.name: AM_InternalNodeNotFound_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when trying to open a link of an internal node and this node is not found in the account in which the user is logged in - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_SSLKeyError
data.value: MEGA не може безпечно під'єднатись через SSL. Ви можете бути у громадському WiFi з додатковими вимогами.

data.name: AM_SSLKeyError_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when MEGA SSL key can't be verified (API_ESSL Error).

data.name: AM_PasswordReminder

data.comment: Message to describe the purpose of the password reminder dialog.

data.name: AM_PasswordReminder_Title
data.comment: Title of the password reminder dialog.

data.name: AM_TestPassword

data.comment: Message to describe the purpose of the dialog to test the password.

data.name: AM_TestPasswordSuccess
data.value: Password accepted, we still recommend you back up your Recovery Key.
data.comment: Message displayed when the password test result is ok.

data.value: Wrong password! Backup your Recovery Key as soon as possible!

data.name: AM_TestPassword_Title
data.comment: Title of the test password dialog.

data.comment: Title of the dialog or notification displayed in cases that the app has succesful exported the recovery key.

data.comment: Title of the dialog or notification displayed in cases that the app has not succesful exported the recovery key.

data.name: AM_CloseOtherSessionsQuestionMessage
data.value: Do you want to close all other sessions? This will log you out on all other active sessions except the current one.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed to ask the user to confirm want to close all the other sessions.

data.name: AM_2FA_SetupDialogDescription
data.value: Two-factor authentication is a second layer of security for your account. Which means that even if someone knows your password they cannot access it, without also having access to the six digit code only you have access to.
data.comment: Description text of the dialog displayed to start setup the Two-Factor Authentication

data.name: AM_2FA_SetupDialogTitle
data.value: Why do you need two-factor authentication?
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed to start setup the Two-Factor Authentication

data.name: AM_InvalidCode
data.value: This code isn’t right, please try again.
data.comment: Message displayed when the user is trying to insert and invalid code, for example the 6-digit code of the Multi-Factor Authentication.

data.name: AM_2FA_EnabledDialogDescription
data.value: Next time you login to your account you will be asked to enter a 6-digit code provided by your Authenticator App.
data.comment: Description text of the dialog displayed to indicate that the user has successfully enabled the Two-Factor Authentication.

data.name: AM_2FA_EnabledDialogTitle
data.comment: Title text of the dialog displayed to indicate that the user has successfully enabled the Two-Factor Authentication.

data.name: AM_MFA_SeedCopied
data.value: The seed has been copied to your clipboard.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the seed needed to enable the Multi-Factor Authentication has been copied successfully to the clipboard.

data.name: AM_MFA_SeedCopiedFailed
data.value: Failed to copy the seed to your clipboard. Please try again.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed if fails the process to copy the seed needed to enable the Multi-Factor Authentication to the clipboard.

data.name: AM_MFA_SeedCopiedFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed if fails the process to copy the seed needed to enable the Multi-Factor Authentication to the clipboard.

data.name: AM_MFA_SeedCopied_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the seed needed to enable the Multi-Factor Authentication has been copied successfully to the clipboard.

data.name: AM_2FA_InputAppCodeDialogMessage
data.value: Please enter the 6-digit code generated by your Authenticator App.
data.comment: Description text of the dialog displayed to introduce the 6-digit code for the MFA.

data.name: AM_2FA_DisableDialogTitle
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed to disable the Two-Factor Authentication.

data.name: AM_2FA_EnabledDialogRecommendation
data.value: If you lose access to your account after enabling 2FA and you have not backed up your Recovery Key, MEGA can’t help you gain access to it again. Ensure you back up your recovery key.
data.comment: Text recommending export the Recovery Key in the dialog displayed to indicate that the user has successfully enabled the Two-Factor Authentication. KEEP the multi-line format.

data.name: AM_2FA_DisabledDialogTitle
data.comment: Title text of the dialog displayed to indicate that the user has successfully disabled the Two-Factor Authentication.

data.name: AM_RestoreFromRubbishBinFailed
data.value: Failed to restore ‘{0}’ from rubbish bin. Please try again.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to restore a node to the rubbish bin failed. Preserve the '{0}' code because is for include the file/folder name in runtime.

data.name: AM_RestoreFromRubbishBinFailed_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when the process/request to restore nodes from the rubbish bin failed - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_RestoreMultiFromRubbishBinFailed
data.value: Failed to restore items from rubbish bin. Please try again.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process/request to restore multiple nodes from the rubbish bin failed.

data.name: AM_MFA_CheckStatusFailed
data.value: Failed to check the status of two factor authentication.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed if fails the process to check the Multi-Factor Authentication status.

data.name: AM_FileAlreadyExists
data.value: There is already a file with the same name
data.comment: Message which shows when a file name is duplicated during renaming.

data.name: AM_FolderAlreadyExists
data.value: There is already a folder with the same name
data.comment: Message which is shown when a folder name is duplicated during renaming or creation.

data.name: AM_ResumeSessionFailed
data.value: Failed to resume your session. Please, close the app and try again later.
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when the process to resume a session failed.

data.name: AM_StorageOverquotaPreAlert
data.value: Операцію не буде виконано, інакше перевищиться ліміт збереження даних вашого облікового запису. Хочете покращити акаунт?
data.comment: Message of the dialog displayed when a user tries to make an operation that will exceed the storage space limits of the account (API_EGOINGOVERQUOTA error). Asks if user wants to upgrade the account type.

data.name: AM_StorageOverquotaPreAlert_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user tries to make an operation that will exceed the storage space limits of the account (API_EGOINGOVERQUOTA error) - (String as short as possible).

data.name: AM_StorageOverquotaAlert
data.value: You have exceeded your storage limit. Would you like to upgrade your account?
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user exceeds the storage space limits of the account.

data.name: AM_StorageOverquotaAlert_Title
data.comment: Title of the dialog displayed when a user exceeds the storage space limits of the account - (String as short as possible).
